item.title: iConnect: Eat for cheap!
item.author: Roland Sookias,
item.description: So what is ‘iConnect’? iConnect is a project started by the Innovation Society. It was initially started as an online marketplace but now we’re launching the “Big Plan” – Group Buying for Imperial College at iConnectImperial.com. The idea is simple: if there are enough people willing to purchase the …
